script: You will be given three messages from different people Dr. Allison Miller, Phillip Calvey-Bradden, and Alannah Lovett.
Dr. Allison Miller: Bring to the meeting a way to escape quickly over land.
Phillip Calvey-Bradden: The time we will meet is when the sun starts its travel across the sky.
Alannah Lovett: We will rendezvous where the land meets the sea.
Given the clandestine messages you have received, tell me as specifically as you can, when and where the meeting is going to happen and what you should bring.
